contentrichtext.text: {{about|the Bass Islands of Lake Erie|the Bass Islands (ÃŽles du Bass) of [[French Polynesia]]|Bass Islands (French Polynesia)}} {{unreferenced|date=May 2013}} [[Image:Bass Islands map.png|thumb|right|Map of the Bass Islands.]] [[Image:Lake-erie-south-bass-island.jpg|right|thumb||[[South Bass Island]] from the air, looking west, over [[Put-in-Bay]].]] The '''Bass Islands''' are three [[United States|American]] islands in the western half of [[Lake Erie]]. They are north of [[Sandusky, Ohio|Sandusky]], [[Ohio]] and south of [[Pelee, Ontario|Pelee Island]], [[Ontario]]. [[South Bass Island]] ({{coord|41.6497|-82.8189|type:isle_region:US-OH|display=inline|name=South Bass Island}}) is the largest of the islands, followed closely by [[North Bass Island]] ({{coord|41.7160|-82.8196|type:isle_region:US-OH|display=inline|name=North Bass Island}}) and [[Middle Bass Island]] ({{coord|41.6821|-82.8107|type:isle_region:US-OH|display=inline|name=Middle Bass Island}}). They are located in [[Put-in-Bay Township, Ottawa County, Ohio|Put-in-Bay Township]], [[Ottawa County, Ohio|Ottawa County]] in the [[U.S. state|state]] of Ohio. Historically Middle Bass has also been called Ile de Fleurs and North Bass was known as Isle St. George. At their closest points, Middle Bass Island is approximately 0.5 mi (0.8 km) north of South Bass Island and North Bass Island is approximately 1.0 mi (1.6 km) north of Middle Bass Island. The border between Ohio and [[Ontario]] is approximately 1.0 mi (1.6 km) north of North Bass Island. The village of [[Put-in-Bay, Ohio|Put-in-Bay]] on South Bass Island is a popular tourist stop during the summer. [[Perry's Victory and International Peace Memorial]], commemorating the [[Battle of Lake Erie]], is located on South Bass Island, near Put-In-Bay. The island is also the annual host of the Inter-Lake Yachting Association regatta, known as Bay Week. ==External links== * [http://www.dnr.state.oh.us/parks/parks/lakeerie/tabid/753/Default.aspx Lake Erie Islands State Park] * [http://www.dnr.state.oh.us/parks/parks/middlebass/tabid/766/Default.aspx Middle Bass Island State Park] [[Category:Islands of Ohio]] [[Category:Geography of Ottawa County, Ohio]] [[Category:Islands of Lake Erie]]
